author: Baha'u'llah
source_text:
أن يا عبد طوبى لک بما عرف ت الح ق وأعرض ت عن ال ذي کفر بال رحمن
أن یا عبد طوبی لک بما عرفتَ الحقّ وأعرضتَ عن الّذي کفر بالرّحمن وکان في أُمّ الأ
translation: Blessed art thou, O My servant, inasmuch as thou hast recognized the Truth, and withdrawn from him who repudiated the All-Merciful, and was condemned as wicked in the Mother Tablet. Walk thou steadfastly in the love of God, and keep straight on in His Faith, and aid Him through the power of thine utterance. Thus biddeth thee the All-Merciful Who is suffering imprisonment at the hands of His oppressors.
